quote: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today, and you make your tomorrow.
author: L. Ron Hubbard

quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it…
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: The saddest thing about love is that not only that it cannot last forever, but that heartbreak is soon forgotten.
author: William Faulkner

quote: I have lost and loved and won and cried myself to the person I am today.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: What do I have to do to make you see she can’t love you like me
author: Sugarland

quote: If people refuse to look at you in a new light and they can only see you for what you were, only see you for the mistakes you’ve made, if they don’t realize that you are not your mistakes, then they have to go.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: I wish i were a little girl again, because skinned knees are easier to fix than broken heart.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: You can’t give your heart to a wild thing.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Think about any attachments that are depleting your emotional reserves. Consider letting them go.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If you want to forget something or someone, never hate it, or never hate him/her. Everything and everyone that you hate is engraved upon your heart; if you want to let go of something, if you want to forget, you cannot hate.
author: C. Joybell C.

quote: I realise there’s something incredibly honest about trees in winter, how they’re experts at letting things go.
author: Jeffrey McDaniel

quote: Hanging on to resentment is letting someone you despise live rent-free in your head.
author: Ann Landers

quote: There are all kinds of ways for a relationship to be tested, even broken, some, irrevocably; it’s the endings we’re unprepared for.
author: Katherine Owen

quote: Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
author: Mineko Iwasaki

quote: There are a million ways to lose someone you love.
author: Tammara Webber

quote: Sometimes you break your heart in the right way, if you know what I mean.
author: Gregory Roberts

quote: Sometimes… Sometimes our hearts…crack a little.
author: Brodi Ashton

quote: I’m not supposed to miss you, I’m not supposed to care
author: Debra Cox

quote: When one door closes another door opens; but we so often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door, that we do not see the ones which open for us.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Let go. Why do you cling to pain? There is nothing you can do about the wrongs of yesterday. It is not yours to judge. Why hold on to the very thing which keeps you from hope and love?
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: When trees burn, they leave the smell of heartbreak in the air.
author: Jodi Thomas

quote: The past can’t hurt you anymore, not unless you let it.
author: Alan Moore

quote: I never wanted but your heart–that gone, you have nothing more to give.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes just be an illusion.
author: Javan

quote: Sometimes the only way the good Lord can get into some hearts is to break them.
author: Fulton Sheen

quote: I mean, at the end of the day, what the hell does it matter who I end up with if it can’t be you?
author: Tabitha Suzuma

quote: No matter how bad your heart is broken, the world doesn’t stop for your grief.
author: Faraaz Kazi

quote: I pray that former rejection and deep hurts will not color what I see and hear now.
author: Sue Augustine

quote: You can victimize yourself by wallowing around in your own past.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Hands that never touch. Lips that never meet. The Almost Lovers, never to be.
author: Rae Hachton

quote: There will be a time when you are forced to follow your heart away from someone you love.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: So it’s true, when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.
author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quote: They should tell you when you’re born: have a suitcase heart, be ready to travel.
author: Gabrielle Zevin

quote: Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Why did I always end up loving the person who hurt me the most? Why was love so cruel?
author: J.C. Reed

quote: Then his heart, now broken into a thousand pieces, slowly began to turn to ice.
author: Morgan Rhodes

quote: Heartbreak could be lived with if it weren’t accompanied by regret.
author: Laura Kasischke

quote: We have to do with the past only as we can make it useful to the present and the future.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: The heart was made to be broken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I know my heart will never be the same but I’m telling myself I’ll be okay
author: Sara Evans

quote: You’re gonna catch a cold from the ice inside your soul
author: Christina Perri

quote: Love hurts worse than getting slammed by a 250-pound linebacker.
author: Miranda Kenneally

quote: We are all Romeos looking for our Juliet, but never finding her.
author: Rae Hacton

quote: Never love that which you cannot keep.
author: Anonymous

quote: Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: ’Right actions in the future are the best apologies for bad actions in the past.
author: Tryon Edwards

quote: Don’t you EVER break someone’s heart, because they only have one. Break their bones, they have 206 on those!
author: Jayy Von Monroe

quote: Once you had put the pieces back together, even though you may look intact, you were never quite the same as you’d been before the fall.
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: ’Hearts are breakable,’ Isabelle said. ‘And I think even when you heal, you’re never what you were before.'
author: Cassandra Clare
